text: Karel Černý is the name of: * Karel Černý (actor) (1892–?), Czechoslovak actor in The Blue Star Hotel * Karel Černý (art director) (1922–2014), Czech Academy Award winner *Karel Černý of the Prague Section of IADR * Karel Černý (footballer) (born 1910), represented Czechoslovakia in the 1938 FIFA World Cup * Karel Černý (rower), Czechoslovak rower who came second in quad scull at the 1977 World Rowing Championships * Carl Czerny (1791−1857), Austrian pianist, composer and teacher
title: Karel Černý
